### Quick to-do
1. Replace “Your Name” and links in `_quarto.yml`
2. Drop your PDFs into `research/papers/`
3. Add your slides embed code (or a video export) to `research/index.qmd`
4. Build your PyGame-to-web bundle with `pygbag` and copy it into `misc/game/`
